akn:content.akn:p: (a) The President shall transmit to each House of the Congress, and make available to the public, reports containing information described in subsection (b) for each fiscal year beginning on or after the effective date of this section. Each such report shall be transmitted no later than 60 days after the close of the fiscal year covered by such report and shall contain a statement of such information for such year.
(b) Each report required under subsection (a) shall contain— The information required under this subsection to be in any report shall be shown both in the aggregate and by office involved.
